::Havoc/Repressor::

Havoc's eyes widen as Demolition twists his arm around his back 
unexpectedly. He twists his arm in Demolition's grasp so that he 
could spin around, spinning around and punching at Demolition's chest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor smiles, watching the battle between Havoc and Demolition. 
He stretches out both hands, a sword appearing in each, and slowly 
approaches his two teammates.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Demolition::
> 
> This was what he wanted. He droped his sword, and grabbed the arm 
coming
> down, at his head. With one quick motion he twisted the arm around
> Havoc's back.
